basic.floral_language:
Sedum lineare Variegatum 
Floriography: tenacious, straight-hearted, vigorous
Has many branches and thin emerald green leaves like long nails. In a cool season with adequate light, leaves turn golden yellow. Grows fast, suitable for potted individually or in gardens.
Likes adequate light, tolerates strong sunlight, in winter takes a dormant period and the plant may dry, but will emerge in the next spring. Flowers are yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color emerald green, with a great diurnal temperature range, with adequate sunlight turning to golden yellow

maintenance.soil: No strict requirements on the soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, not fear of strong light, dormant in winter under low temperatures
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Require litter fertilization, dilute fertilizers following instructions, in spring to autumn apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
